selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract text from the attached image to identify the demand values for computing and wireless sectors in 2014.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the table data and locate the demand values for the specified sectors and year.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the total semiconductor demand by summing the extracted demand values for computing and wireless sectors.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted demand values in a numeric expression to compute the sum.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final result to match the required output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated total demand to produce a formatted answer string.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_demand_values_from_table
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract demand values for specified sectors and year from a table in an image.
edge_cases: Table does not contain the specified year
Sectors not found in the table
